data.why:
I will start by Acme::Bibi. The goal is to support an alternative
    to the hexadecimal notation. It is called bibinaire and used for
    numbers expressed in base 16. It uses syllables instead of the bland
    '0'..'9','A'..'D'

    For more info see:
    http://worldserver2.oleane.com/fatrazie/Bibi.html

    I intent do support more serious modules later. :)
